content:
Hi, just curious whether deploying bots on the zulip server (as opposed to a separate server/vm/etc) is frowned upon?
The documentation doesn't seem to suggest whether it should be avoided or not (convenience vs security for example).
Reason being if I throw it all on the same VM, the installation is slightly more self-contained, and can probably just listen on localhost instead of a public IP.
I'm curious what other peoples thoughts are.
@Arthur Read there's no real problem with deploying those on the Zulip server, but we try to be clear that they don't have to be, either.
Cheers, just double-checking if I'm about to get myself in trouble :)
